CustomField.description:
If "Type" is "Custom Tab (Page)", provide the URL beginning after the Salesforce base URL and include merge fields in the proper syntax (i.e. /lightning/n/Relationships?c__recordId=[RECORD_ID]&c__objectType=[OBJECT_API_NAME]).
If "Type" is "External", provide the full URL of the external site (i.e. https://www.utah.edu).
Supported merge fields are: [RECORD_ID], [RECORD_NAME], [OBJECT_API_NAME].
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
If "Type" is "Custom Tab (Page)", provide the URL beginning after the Salesforce base URL and include merge fields in the proper syntax (i.e. /lightning/n/Relationships?c__recordId=[RECORD_ID]&c__objectType=[OBJECT_API_NAME]).
If "Type" is "External", provide the full URL of the external site (i.e. https://www.utah.edu).
Supported merge fields are: [RECORD_ID], [RECORD_NAME], [OBJECT_API_NAME].
CustomField.label: URL
